proudList.proudText: I've mentored and helped land a job or get promoted over 30 people as web developers across all levels: junior, mid and senior.
I had 2 cows and 3 pigs and I go farming everyday
I've raised close to 100,000 subscribers and more than 5 million views across the social networks CodeTap is present on helping young developers jumpstart their career all over the world.
I walked everyday at lest 2km to go to school.
